snippet: Mr. Marre directed or staged more than two-dozen Broadway shows during his more than 50 years in theater, but it was “Man of La Mancha” that brought him his greatest acclaim.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Marre directed or staged more than two-dozen Broadway shows during his more than 50 years in theater, but it was “Man of La Mancha” that brought him his greatest acclaim.

headline.seo: Albert Marre, Director of ‘Man of La Mancha,’ Dies at 87
headline.main: Albert Marre, Director, Is Dead at 87
headline.print_headline: Albert Marre, Director, Is Dead at 87
